title: Ticket #4537: Incorrect default for GANGLIAD_METRICS_CONFIG_DIR in RPMs
description:
In the RPM, GANGLIAD_METRICS_CONFIG_DIR defaults to $(RELEASE_DIR)/etc/condor/ganglia.d. This resolves to /usr/etc/condor/ganglia.d, which isn't shipped by the RPM (and causes condor_gangliad to EXCEPT).

We probably want /etc/condor/ganglia.d.

Better yet - we should have all the defaults in /usr/share/condor/ganglia.d and just allow sysadmins to override things in /etc/condor/ganglia.d. That way, there is always a clean upgrade path when we add/remove default metrics. Looking at the code, I think this would work with minimal code changes:

GANGLIAD_METRICS_CONFIG_DIR=/usr/share/condor/ganglia.d,/etc/condor/ganglia.d

We do a similar trick with the HTCondor-CE to keep sysadmins honest when overriding defaults.
